name: Turbo Trasher
description:
Turbo Trasher a post-apocalyptic styled Mario Kart

This game was made during my education on Games Development with Unity & FMOD

Music provied by Artist (unfortunately lost)

Controlls (X-Box styled Controller preferred) Keyboard/Mouse

Acceleration: W

Deceleration: S

Steering: A/D
Main Gun: Left-Mouse

Side Gun: Right-Mouse

Support Gun : Space

Pause Menu: Esc

Controller (X-Box Styled)

Acceleration: Right Trigger

Deceleration: Left Trigger

Steering: Left Joystick

Main Gun: A

Side Gun: B

Support Gun : X

Pause Menu: Start Button

Know Issues:

Sound clipping

Sensitive Steering

Buttons not accessable/focus lost (Keyboard/Mouse)
